results.title: Effect of angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors on the power spectrum of heart rate variability in post-myocardial infarction patients.
results.text_hl: This influence of some ACE inhibitors on HRV may be beneficial in reducing the risk for @<m>DISEASE_Death_Sudden</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003645 @@@sudden death@@@ in @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@post-myocardial infarction@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Kontopoulos AG, Athyros VG, Papageorgiou AA, Skeberis VM, Basayiannis EC, Boudoulas H. Effect of angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors on the power spectrum of heart rate variability in post-myocardial infarction patients. Coron Artery Dis. 1997 Aug-Sep;8(8-9):517-24. PMID: 9431480

results.title: Systematic review: antihypertensive drug therapy in patients of African and South Asian ethnicity
results.text_hl: Trials with morbidity and mortality outcomes indicated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@-based therapy were associated with a greater incidence of @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Death_Sudden</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003645 @@@sudden death@@@.

citations.NLM: Brewster LM, van Montfrans GA, Oehlers GP, Seedat YK. Systematic review: antihypertensive drug therapy in patients of African and South Asian ethnicity Intern Emerg Med. 2016 Apr;11(3):355-74. PMID: 27026378
